name: Housing
description: Statistics on family structure, housing costs, and type of housing.

name: Demographics
description: Statistics on population numbers, community type classifications, age groups, languages spoken, and permanent residency.

name: Education
description: Statistics on access to schools and population education levels.

name: Income and Jobs
description: Statistics on employment rates, job frequency classified by NOC code, and income.

name: Economic Projects
description: Statistics on economic projects, funding and status.

name: Health and Emergency
description: Statistics on hospital access and emergency response.

name: Government Services
description: Statistics on access to civic facilities and government services.

name: Connectivity
description: Statistics on access to internet and electricity.
